subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said the San Diego Chargers, the Oakland Raiders and the St. Louis Rams understood the risks that went along with applying for relocation.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said the San Diego Chargers, the Oakland Raiders and the St. Louis Rams understood the risks that went along with applying for relocation.
